children.subject: I took 188 with Professor Abbeel the past Spring semester. Not only the lectures were webcasted, the discussion sessions were also(not sure if they will still be doing it next semester). And the midterms were during evening times(not lecture time). Moreover, the webcasted lectures also have a well-constructed mini version. So unless something changes in the coming Spring dramatically, they should be webcasted. Highly recommend taking it with Abbeel!!

history.content: The other issue is that usually courses with a schedule conflict also have conflicting final exam schedules and instructors are not required to offer alternate final exam times so you would need to have one of the instructors agree to do so before you signed up for both courses -- or at least before the drop deadline.
I have a potential class conflict with CS 188, and would the midterms take place during class too?
history.subject: Will CS 188 be webcasted next semester?
